column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Started with the beef tongue
column3: and the classic ribeye.  Beef tongue melted in your mouth
column4: the way it's supposed to.  The ribeye was cooked perfectly too
column5: but the real standout was the stroganoff.  I don't know what kind of high-grade crack cocaine they sprinkled on it
column6: but it definitely did the trick.
